text:
In the fight of the century, former pro-boxer Mike Tyson may be getting into the rink with Russian President Vladimir Putin, RadarOnline.com has learned.

Sources have confessed to Straight Shuter that very wealthy businessmen have offered the 51-year-old pro boxer over $500K to travel to Russia and have a boxing match with the 64-year-old President.

He has also been offered a small fortune to do a convention in New York City, backed of course, by the Russians.
title: Mike Tyson Offered SERIOUS Ca$h To Fight Russian Dictator Vladimir Putin

meta_data.description: Will former pro-boxer Mike Tyson punch the Russian president’s lights out for a small fortune?
